channel.title: Triatempora - Time is not a straight line
channel.description: Exploring ancient wisdom, consciousness mysteries, UFO files, conspiracy theories, forbidden science, mystical geography, secret projects, and the matrix.

item.title: Gunung Padang: Indonesia's Controversial Ancient Pyramid
item.description: Explore Gunung Padang, Indonesia's controversial megalithic site that may challenge our understanding of Ice Age civilizations, featuring claims of construction dating back 27,000 years.

item.title: The Israeli-Palestinian Conflict: History, Geopolitics, and Future
item.description: A comprehensive historical analysis of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict from ancient Canaan to modern geopolitics, examining colonial betrayals, religious claims, and the human cost of endless war.

item.description: The Great Sphinx of Giza - older than we think, hiding secrets beneath the sands.

item.title: The Great Pyramid: Ancient Power Plant or Royal Tomb?
item.description: Tesla knew the secret - the Great Pyramid as an ancient power plant.

item.title: The Birth of The Matrix: When Humanity Created Its Own Demise

item.title: An Epic Exploration of Reality, Choice, and Awakening

item.title: The Oracle's Grand Design: The Master Plan That Saved Two Worlds
item.description: Behind the warm smile of a grandmother baking cookies lurked one of the most brilliant strategic minds ever created. Discover the Oracle's dangerous gambit.
